hotel_name: T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne 400 m plage
hotel_description:
In the Parame district of Saint Malo, close to Rochebonne Beach, T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne 400 m plage features free bikes, free WiFi and a washing machine. With city views, this accommodation features a balcony.

The apartment with a terrace and garden views has 1 bedroom, a living room, a flat-screen TV, an equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and 1 bathroom with a shower. Towels and bed linen are available in the apartment.

Guests can relax in the garden at the property.

Sillon Beach is 600 metres from the apartment, while Minihic Beach is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 75 km from T2 terrasse de charme à Rochebonne 400 m plage.

Les Charmettes, on the seafront in the Brittany town of Saint-Malo, offers direct beach access and a guests can sample a drink at the beach bar. Each guest room has a private bathroom, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.

All seaside room feature a balcony, while other rooms look onto the courtyard. All rooms come with a nautical theme.

The hotel Les Charmettes serves a continental breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the dining room or in the comfort of your room. The on-site restaurant serves traditional meals including seafood platters. Guests can also relax on the hotel terrace, overlooking the sea.

The Sillon beach is situated directly in front of the hotel and the Saint Malo Train Station is 2 km away. Guests can reach Saint-Malo city centre within 30 minutes by walk.

Le Paraméen - Appartement pour 6 is set in the Parame district of Saint Malo, 1.3 km from Rochebonne Beach, 1.7 km from Minihic Beach and 3.2 km from Palais du Grand Large. The accommodation is 1.3 km from the Sillon Beach and features free WiFithroughout the property.

The 2-bedroom apartment is fitted with a living room with a TV, a fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher and oven, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are featured in the apartment.

Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 3.3 km from the apartment, while National Fort is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Dinard–Pleurtuit–Saint-Malo Airport, 14 km from Le Paraméen - Appartement pour 6.

Set 1.5 km from Sillon Beach, 1.8 km from Eventail Beach and 1.9 km from Palais du Grand Large, LITTLE BAHIA offers accommodation situated in Saint Malo. The accommodation is 1.3 km from the Bas-Sablons Beach and has free WiFithroughout the property.

The 1-bedroom apartment has a living room with a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a fully equipped kitchen with oven and microwave, and 1 bathroom with a hair dryer. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 1.8 km from the apartment, while Solidor Tower is 1.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 71 km from LITTLE BAHIA.

Situated in Saint Malo, just 200 metres from Rochebonne Beach, la merveille de Rochebonne 3 features beachfront accommodation with free WiFi. The property has garden views and is 200 metres from Sillon Beach and 700 metres from Minihic Beach.

This apartment has 1 bedroom, a kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, a flat-screen TV, a seating area and 1 bathroom fitted with a shower. Towels and bed linen are offered in the apartment.

Palais du Grand Large is 2.7 km from the apartment, while Casino Barrière Saint-Malo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jersey Airport, 75 km from la merveille de Rochebonne 3.
